attributes.action: Offer John Smeaton and Michael Kerr formal recognition of their heroic act against terrorism
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Recognising danger against fellow humans and acted unselfishly to protect them.  For this alone, John and Michael deserve recognition - however setting the standard for the continuing struggle against terrorism in the UK - deserves greater prominence and official recognition.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
